name: Yujun Yan
content: Yujun YanSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYujun YanAssistant ProfessorDepartment of Computer ScienceDartmouth CollegeOffice: ECSC 215, 15 Thayer DriveHanover, NH 03755-4404Email: first.last at dartmouth dot eduGoogle Scholar | CV | TwitterI am an Assistant Professor at Dartmouth College, where I joined in 2023. My research lies at the intersection of machine learning and network science, with a focus on modeling complex topological structures. I aim to develop more expressive and generalizable graph-based ML models by integrating theoretical insights with practical designs. Beyond foundational work, I explore the application of structural modeling in domains such as neuroscience, knowledge reasoning, and multi-agent systems. I earned my Ph.D. from the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor in 2022, under the supervision of Danai Koutra. I am recruiting Ph.D. students and interns. Many motivated interns have the opportunity to produce a paper or submission during their internship.Please send your CV and transcripts via email if you are interested in working with me.
